p.e:
THE SEWERS UNDER RAVENSWICH!

DEEPER DOWN IN THE PIPES...
I JUST SAW SOMETHING IN THEM...
I... I CANNOT QUITE COMPREHEND
WHAT IT WAS!

IT SMELLED ALMOST SWEET AND
BITTER AT ONCE.  THE COLOR WAS
ALMOST AS IF OUT OF SPACE.

I STILL FEEL DISCOMBOBULATED
AND HAVE LOST TRACK OF TIME.

WHAT IS THAT CREEPING BEHIND
ME NOW WHICH VANISHES WHEN
I TURN TO CHECK??

--A.W.
